tasks.task: Managing urge to defecate while working in paddocks
subtasks: Stay in the paddock until finding a suitable area
Plan route to access toilet facilities as soon as possible
Consider wearing more accessible clothing for quick stops
Inform colleagues of need to use toilet to coordinate breaks MAINTASK: Dealing with emergency situations while working outdoors
Assess proximity to nearest toilet facility
Remember potential rest stops or public amenities along route
Map out an escape route to toilet in advance
Inform supervisor about bathroom needs to adjust work schedule
Use portable toilet or natural bathroom if immediate facilities not available

tasks.task: Managing urge to defecate while working in paddocks**
subtasks: * Stay in the paddock until finding a suitable area
* Plan route to access toilet facilities as soon as possible
* Consider wearing more accessible clothing for quick stops
* Inform colleagues of need to use toilet to coordinate breaks

tasks.task: Dealing with emergency situations while working outdoors**
subtasks: * Assess proximity to nearest toilet facility
* Remember potential rest stops or public amenities along the route
* Map out an escape route to toilet in advance
* Inform supervisor about bathroom needs to adjust work schedule
* Use portable toilet or natural bathroom if immediate facilities not available
